result.title: Kyoto University Programming Contest 2017
result.content:
Hi,

I would like to invite you to Kyoto University Programming Contest (KUPC), which will be held on 1 Oct. (4:00 — 9:00 GMT). Problem writers consist of several students in Kyoto University. The contest will be held on AtCoder. The contest is unofficial, so it's unrated.

Contest Link

The contest duration is 5 hours, and there will be 12 problems. The first a few problems are easy, so I'm sure everyone can enjoy the contest. On the other hand, a few problems from the last are probably interesting and though enough for high rated coders. We hope lots of people will compete in our contest. Good luck and have fun.

writers: asi1024, joisino, drafear, amano, and more
